snippet: Wicked Strong won by three and a half lengths, rewarding his backers with $20.40 for a $2 bet, and delivering a $590,000 first-place check to his owners, Centennial Farms.
abstract: Horse Racing Roundup; Wicked Strong wins Wood Memorial at Aqueduct by three and a half lengths and ensures a place in the gate for the 140th running of the Kentucky Derby; other news noted
lead_paragraph: Wicked Strong won by three and a half lengths, rewarding his backers with $20.40 for a $2 bet, and delivering a $590,000 first-place check to his owners, Centennial Farms.

headline.main: With Upset at Wood Memorial, Wicked Strong Ensures Spot in Derby
headline.print_headline: With Upset at Wood Memorial, Wicked Strong Ensures Spot in Derby
